headline: Exclusive-HSBC cutting staff numbers by 900 at China Pinnacle unit, sources say
summary: HSBC is reducing staff numbers at its China digital wealth business Pinnacle by nearly half, or about 900 people, two sources said, a sharp reversal of the bank's ambition for the unit as part of its...
